description: Abgabe fÃ¼r das Modul "Web-Entwicklung" im SS2017

scripts.lint: echo '=> linting' && eslint -c ./.eslintrc.json webapp/src/js/**.js && eslint -c ./.eslintrc.json server/**.js
scripts.html: echo '=> creating static html files' && mkdir -p dist && cp webapp/src/index.html dist/
scripts.css: echo '=> converting less to css' && mkdir -p dist/style && lessc webapp/src/style/style.less dist/style/style.css
scripts.css_minify: echo '=> converting less to css & minifying' && mkdir -p dist/style && lessc --clean-css webapp/src/style/style.less dist/style/style.css
scripts.js: echo '=> making js files ready for browser' && mkdir -p dist/js && browserify webapp/src/js/main.js > dist/js/main.js
scripts.img: echo '=> copying the assets' && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp webapp/src/assets/* dist/assets/
scripts.minify: echo '=> minify all ressources' && babili dist/js/main.js > dist/js/main.min.js && rm dist/js/main.js && mv dist/js/main.min.js dist/js/main.js && npm run css_minify
scripts.clean: echo '=> cleaning project' && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist
scripts.build: echo '=> building project' && npm run lint && npm run html && npm run css && npm run js && npm run img && npm run minify
scripts.debug: echo '=> building debug project' && npm run lint && npm run html && npm run css && npm run js && npm run img
